enums.name: ClockType
enums.description: which type of clock to use

enums.name: Method
enums.description: An enumeration representing the types of HTTP requests available to make.

values.name: METHOD_UNKOWN
values.description: Unset HTTP method will default to METHOD_GET

enums.name: AggregationMethod
enums.description: The methods of combining a list of numerical results.

values.name: MIN
values.description: Grab the minimum value of the results.

values.name: MAX
values.description: Grab the maximum value of the results.

values.name: SUM
values.description: Sum up all of the results.

values.name: MEDIAN
values.description: Grab the median of the results.

messages.name: OracleJob
messages.description: Represnts a list of tasks to be performed by a switchboard oracle.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: The chain of tasks to perform for this OracleJob.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: AddTask
messages.description:
This task will add a numerical input by a scalar value or by another
aggregate.

fields.name: scalar
fields.description: Specifies a scalar to add by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Specifies an aggregator to add by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: job
fields.description: A job whose result is computed before adding our numerical input by that result.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

messages.name: CacheTask
messages.description: Execute a job and store the result in a variable to reference later.

fields.name: cache_items
fields.description: A list of cached variables to reference in the job with `${VARIABLE_NAME}`.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: variable_name
fields.description: The name of the variable to store in cache to reference later with `${VARIABLE_NAME}`.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: job
fields.description: The OracleJob to execute to yield the value to store in cache.
fields.label: optional

messages.name: ConditionalTask
messages.description:
This task will run the `attempt` subtasks in an effort to produce a valid numerical result. If
`attempt` fails to produce an acceptable result, `on_failure` subtasks will be run instead.

fields.name: attempt
fields.description: A list of subtasks to process in an attempt to produce a valid numerical result.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: on_failure
fields.description:
A list of subtasks that will be run if `attempt` subtasks are unable to produce an acceptable
result.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: CronParseTask
messages.description: return a timestamp from a crontab instruction

fields.name: cron_pattern
fields.description: the cron pattern to parse
fields.label: optional

fields.name: clock_offset
fields.description:
the timestamp offset 
to calculate the next run
fields.label: optional

messages.name: DivideTask
messages.description:
This task will divide a numerical input by a scalar value or by another
aggregate.

fields.name: scalar
fields.description: Specifies a basic scalar denominator to divide by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Specifies another aggregator resut to divide by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: job
fields.description: A job whose result is computed before dividing our numerical input by that result.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

messages.name: HttpTask

fields.name: url
fields.description: A string containing the URL to direct this HTTP request to.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: method
fields.description: The type of HTTP request to make.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: headers
fields.description: A list of headers to add to this HttpTask.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: body
fields.description: A stringified body (if any) to add to this HttpTask.
fields.label: optional

messages.name: Header
messages.description: An object that represents a header to add to an HTTP request.

messages.name: JsonParseTask
messages.description:
The adapter walks the path specified and returns the value found at that result. If returning
JSON data from the HttpGet or HttpPost adapters, you must use this adapter to parse the 
response.

fields.name: path
fields.description:
JSONPath formatted path to the element. https://t.ly/uLtw
https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsonpath-plus
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregation_method
fields.description:
The technique that will be used to aggregate the results if walking the specified path
returns multiple numerical results.
fields.label: optional

messages.name: MaxTask
messages.description: Returns the maximum value of all the results returned by the provided subtasks and subjobs.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of subtasks to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: A list of subjobs to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: MeanTask
messages.description: Returns the mean of all the results returned by the provided subtasks and subjobs.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of subtasks to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: A list of subjobs to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: MedianTask
messages.description: Returns the median of all the results returned by the provided subtasks and subjobs. Nested tasks must return a Number.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of subtasks to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: A list of subjobs to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: MinTask
messages.description: Returns the minimum value of all the results returned by the provided subtasks and subjobs.

fields.name: tasks
fields.description: A list of subtasks to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: jobs
fields.description: A list of subjobs to process and produce a list of result values.
fields.label: repeated

messages.name: MultiplyTask
messages.description: This task will multiply a numerical input by a scalar value or by another aggregator.

fields.name: scalar
fields.description: Specifies a scalar to multiply by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Specifies an aggregator to multiply by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: job
fields.description: A job whose result is computed before multiplying our numerical input by that result.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

messages.name: PowTask
messages.description: Take the power of the working value.

fields.name: scalar
fields.description: Take the working value to the exponent of value.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Take the working value to the exponent of the aggregators value.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

messages.name: SubtractTask
messages.description:
This task will subtract a numerical input by a scalar value or by another
aggregate.

fields.name: scalar
fields.description: Specifies a scalar to subtract by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Specifies an aggregator to subtract by.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: job
fields.description: A job whose result is computed before subtracting our numerical input by that result.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value that will be returned from this task.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: aggregator_pubkey
fields.description: Specifies an aggregatorr to pull the value of.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: big
fields.description: A stringified big.js. `Accepts variable expansion syntax.`
fields.label: optional

messages.name: WebsocketTask
messages.description: Opens and maintains a websocket for light speed data retrieval.

fields.name: url
fields.description: The websocket url.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: subscription
fields.description: The websocket message to notify of a new subscription.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: max_data_age_seconds
fields.description: Minimum amount of time required between when the horses are taking out.
fields.label: optional

fields.name: filter
fields.description:
Incoming message JSONPath filter.
Example: "$[?(@.channel == 'ticker' && @.market == 'BTC/USD')]"
fields.label: optional
